articles.description: For the third time this year Danniella Westbrook was rushed to hospital and she thanked staff at Whipps Cross hospital for saving her life as she gave concerned fans a health update
articles.content:
Danniella Westbrook says medics saved her life after she was rushed to hospital claiming she was just 'hours away' from a cardiac arrest.

articles.title: Ngozi Fulani's charity Sistah Space stops work over safety - BBC
articles.description: Ngozi Fulani earlier this week said her team had received "horrific abuse" on social media.
articles.content:
